stripped_text: You may install 1 program or piece of hardware from your grip. Run any server. When that run begins, derez 1 piece of ice protecting that server. When that run ends, the Corp may rez the ice derezzed this way, ignoring all costs.
text:
You may install 1 program or piece of hardware from your grip.
Run any server. When that run begins, derez 1 piece of ice protecting that server. When that run ends, the Corp may rez the ice derezzed this way, ignoring all costs.
title: Window of Opportunity
